author: chris2_2_2
content: Well Poolin became the first pool to halt withdrawals and likely won't be the last....some pool wallets balances on chain are clearly not sufficient to cover withdrawals.

author: ctrl_alt_lulz
content: Hi all, I was wondering how does the EF spin up live shadow forks or experimental networks? Eg. scenarios where there could be two chains in the future like how exec/consensus are split now, or experimenting with major changes to the spec or testing/simulating attack vectors on the network. Is this a manual/semi manual process, or something that has software that can config + seed a number of running nodes?
